name: Yo Yo Honey Singh
description: '''Hirdesh "Honey" Singh''' (born 15 March 1983), known professionally as '''Yo Yo Honey Singh''', is an Indian [[singer]] and [[record producer|music producer]]. He commenced his career as a [[hip-hop]] [[record producer|music producer]] in 2003, working as a session and recording artist within the underground music scene until the release of his debut studio album, [[International Villager]].
